doc.field: Bilder-Atlas zu Mekka and ephemera - Hisham Khatib Collection
Bilder-Atlas zu Mekka and ephemera - Hisham Khatib Collection

Mekkaner. Kaufleute (Mekka und Djiddah). Ali Rèjjis (aus einem Geschlechte von Obersten der Mu'èddin, welches von Abdallah ibn Zubair herstammen soll). Mu'èddin (Aufrufer zum Gottesdienste). Meccan. Merchants (Mecca and Jeddah). Ali Rjjjis (from a lineage of Colonel Mu'èddin, which is said to come from Abdallah ibn Zubair). Mu'èddin (caller to prayer).

Merchants (Mecca and Jeddah). Ali Rjjjis (from a lineage of Colonel Mu'èddin, which is said to come from Abdallah ibn Zubair). Mu'èddin (caller to prayer).

Merchants (Mecca and Jeddah). Ali Rjjjis (from a lineage of Colonel Mu'èddin, which is said to come from Abdallah ibn Zubair). Mu'èddin (caller to prayer).: Circa 1884 - 1888
